history.content:
Launchpad is looking for new members! We are a technology club at UC Berkeley that fosters a community of creative and passionate engineers to tackle real-world problems using machine learning.



Check out the cool projects we are offering this semester listed below :)

 

Scribe: Few-shot learning handwriting styles with meta learning, and then generating similar handwritten text with GANs.

Phodexr: Enable semantic search through images and other mediums in a zero-shot manner with CLIP.

Inflection: Voice conversion for personalizing chat bots to speak in any speaker’s voice.

Lucinator: Build a production-ready virtual assistant with industrial pipelines and custom functionalities.

Musicode: Use VQ-VAEs to convert a music snippet to the style of another music file.

Lightspeed (client project): Use style transfer to augment cellular extractions

to detect abnormalities solely through computation.

 

If you’re interested, please check out the following links!

Interest form: https://mailchi.mp/9db3d39d7320/launchpad-mailing-list  

Discord server: https://discord.gg/88GSWbHNaZ 

Our application: https://launchpad.berkeley.edu/apply 

Facebook Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/553991589140314 

Instagram: https://instagram.com/callaunchpad

Recruitment events

Infosession #1: 8/31 8-10 PM (Zoom)

Infosession #2: 9/1 8-10 PM (Soda 430, Wozniak Lounge)

Technical Workshop: 9/2 8-10 PM (Soda 430, Wozniak Lounge)

Application Due: 9/3 11:59 PM

 

Visit the recruitment page on our website for the full timeline with coffee chat, member mingle, and technical interview dates (all by invite only).
